com.model.board

Class Board

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.model.board.Board

  • public class Board
extends java.lang.Object
    The board of the game that created by Shape class.
    In the board you can do:
    1. insert(Player, Location) - insert some symbol to that position.
    2. toString() - to get board in beautiful way to print.
    Since:
    2/23/2017 AD.
    Version:
    3.2.1
    Author:
    bubblebitoey

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private Symbol[][] board 
      private int consecutive
      the win condition player who succeeds in placing consecutive of their character in a horizontal, vertical, or diagonal size.getH() wins the game.

      default the player who succeeds in placing consecutive of their character in a horizontal, vertical, or diagonal size.getH() wins the game.
      private BoardHistory history 
      private Shape size

    • Constructor Detail

      • Board

        public Board(Shape s)
        Create the board with the Shape.
        Important: This Constructor will create board with DEFAULT_WIN_CONDITION as game win condition
        Parameters:
        s - The board shape or the board size.

      • Board

        public Board(Shape s,
             int winCondition)
        Create the board with Shape and the win condition.
        Parameters:
        s - The board shape or the board size.
        winCondition - the win condition (how many consecutive characters in a horizontal, vertical, or diagonal size.getH()).

        public boolean insert(Player player,
                      Location p)
        Insert the player symbol (Player.getSymbol()) at position p in the board.
        Parameters:
        player - the current playing player.
        p - the position.
        Returns:
        true, if insert complete; otherwise, return false.
